author: Frances Martel, Frances Martel
title: Report: China Using Uyghur 'Slave Laborers and Cannon Fodder' to Boost Economy
description: Videos of seemingly hundreds of Muslim Uyghurs leaving western Xinjiang province to work in factories elsewhere indicate that China is plugging the holes in its economy caused by the Wuhan coronavirus with "slave laborers and cannon fodder," the human rights …
